title: AT Kherson Directive Russian Army Welled Gold Balka, Kizmosti, Antonivka, Krynka, Kherson Kherson, General with ...
content: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Zolota Balka, Kizomys, Antonivka, Krynky, Ponyativka of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
